price: Enti sε wͻsakra wͻn adwen na wͻfrε Nyame wͻ neberε mu na wͻyi Zaka no a, εneε mo nuanom ne wͻn wͻ Nyamesom mu. Yεkyerεkyerε Nsεm no mu de ma amanfoͻ a wͻnim.
arabic: فَإِن تَابُواْ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُاْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡ فِي ٱلدِّينِۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-in tābū wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata waātawū al-zakata fa-ikh'wānukum fī al-dīni wanufaṣṣilu al-āyāti liqawmin yaʿlamūna
